title: Ep. 42 "Rumor Control"
description:
What's in a rumor? If you ask Kevin Hart & R. Kelly they may tell you pure BS. Usher still hasn't responded. And we have different opinions on whether there's ever any truth to rumors, when to share them, and how we handle our own gossip.

Shoutout to Mailform!
Check it out at www.mailform.io

CALLING ALL BACHELORS!!!!
Submit your photos and a quick blurb if you're a single guy (or know one) to cocktales.atl@gmail.com

Follow Us!

@cocktalespodcast
